0011001010010000 1010011011110010 1 -> sum: 1101100110000011, cout: 0

0011110001111010 0000101101011011 1 -> sum: 0100011111010110, cout: 0
0010110101010111 1011011001010110 1 -> sum: 1110001110101110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
